text: Atahpara balikadbayera ekajana lajjajarita padaksepe tamra kache agamana karala. Balala, amara pita apanake dakachena, yate apani ye amaderake pani pana kariyechena, tara binimaye puraskara pradana karena. Atahpara musa yakhana tamra kache gelena ebam samasta brttanta barnana karalena, takhana tini balalena, bhaya karo na, tumi jalema sampradayera kabala theke raksa peyecha.
